General.Name: Yevropyeyskaya Elyektrotyekhnika PAO
General.Description: European Eltech Public Joint Stock Company operates in the electrical engineering market. The company provides services for energy supply, electricity supply, electric lighting, and low current systems. It also provides engineering, equipment supply, commissioning, and maintenance services for construction of individual turnkey power supply systems, as well as electrotechnical services; and undertakes engineering projects, such as electric power supply systems and lighting systems for industrial facilities, warehouse complexes, office and administrative buildings, architecture and mood lighting of buildings and architecture objects, landscape lighting, and lighting for sculptures and parks; electrical laboratory and commissioning works. In addition, the company engages in the designing of power supply engineering and electric components for public facilities, electric lighting systems, lightning protection and surge voltage protection systems, and cable support systems; supplying of the specified equipment; electrical installation and commissioning works; electric laboratory services and facility commissioning; and energy conservation and audit activities. Further, it offers Service maintenance; and designs, develops, and supplies oil and gas equipment. The company serves electric power, oil and gas, steel and mining, engineering, telecommunications and data processing centers, and chemical and food industries. European Eltech Public Joint Stock Company was founded in 2004 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
